Title: Ouro Kronii
GameText: Power - Warden of Time: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. Either put 1 card from your trash on top of your deck, or Kronii deals 1 target 2 melee damage.

- One player may skip one of their turn phases on their next turn.
- One player may repeat one of their turn phases on their next turn.
- Ask a player what time it is, then they may play a card.

Title: Boros
GameText:
When Kronii would deal herself fixed psychic damage, you may prevent that damage. If you do, this card deals itself 1 fixed psychic damage.
END PHASE
Either draw 1 card or this card regains 3 HP.
Quote: "By the way, Boros says hi. (He doesn't know what's going on.)"

Title: Gwak!!
GameText:
Kronii deals 1 target 2 sonic damage.
Discard up to 2 cards. Draw that many cards.
Kronii may deal herself 2 fixed psychic damage. If she is dealt damage this way, play 1 card. Otherwise, salvage 1 card.
Quote: "I don't rage over a game, that's nonsense. What could could ever hurt me? ... Gwak! GWAKKKK!"

Title: Harsh Warden
GameText: REACTION: Kronii deals 2 projectile damage to the attacker. If a target is destroyed this way, draw 1 card. Otherwise, discard the top card of your deck.
Quote: If you want to blame someone, blame your own fate. You should know by now... that this world... is beyond salvation.

Title: Kroniichiwa
GameText:
Draw 1 card.
Collect 1 Limited card.
Play 1 card.

Title: Kroniicopter
GameText:
After this card is played, you and 1 ally Hero each draw 2 cards.
When this card is destroyed, you may discard 4 cards from the top of your deck and salvage 1 card.
REACTION: Kronii deals the attacker 2 projectile damage. Destroy this card.

Title: My Own Time
GameText:
After this card is played, Kronii regains X HP, where X is the number of cards in your trash. Then, shuffle your trash into your deck.
Kronii is immune to damage and cannot deal damage.
START PHASE
Destroy this card.
Quote: "I have all the time in the world, I don't see why I have to be rushed for it."

Title: Only the Clock Will Tell
GameText:
Reveal the top two cards of the Villain deck. Replace 1 of the revealed cards, and discard or bury the rest.
Kronii may deal herself 2 fixed psychic damage. If she is dealt damage this way, play 1 card. Otherwise, salvage 1 card.
Quote: Humanity clings to the past and nostalgia                     Will they ever escape from the chains of time?                Only the clock will tell

Title: Past Its Time
GameText:
Destroy 1 Ongoing card or 1 target with 5 or fewer HP. 
Kronii may deal herself 2 fixed psychic damage. If she is dealt damage this way, play 1 card. Otherwise, salvage 1 card.
Quote: "People age cheese, wine, why not sandwiches? What's with this double standard?"

Title: Promise of Time
GameText:
3 Hero characters may deal themselves 2 fixed psychic damage each.
Kronii regains 1 HP for each character dealt damage this way.
Each Hero character dealt damage this way may use 1 power.
Quote: Yes, I seek it, I seek it                The memory of the days when things were

Title: Take Your Time
GameText:
After this card is played, draw 1 card.
Play this in an ally Hero's play area.
END PHASE
That Hero may take their PLAY PHASE, POWER PHASE, or DRAW PHASE. If they do, Kronii deals that Hero character 2 fixed psychic damage, then destroy this card.

Title: The Council - Time
GameText:
After this card is played, each ally Hero may draw 1 card.
After a Hero plays a second card on their turn, they may draw 1 card.
POWER: Play or discover 1 Moment card.

Title: Time Blades
GameText: POWER: Kronii deals 1 target 3 melee damage. Kronii deals 1 target X melee damage, where X is the number of cards you have played this turn.
Quote: "So, these are my swords. If you guys don't listen, you'll be made into shish-kabobs."

Title: Time Slash
GameText:
Kronii deals 1 target 3 irreducible melee damage.
Either discard the top card of the Villain deck or draw 1 card.
Kronii may deal herself 2 fixed psychic damage. If she is dealt damage this way, play 1 card. Otherwise, salvage 1 card.
Quote: "What did I ever do to Ame?"           "Time, lore, you gave her a watch? I dunno."

Title: Unshakeable Confidence
GameText:
PLAY PHASE
You may play an additional card this phase.
END PHASE
If you played at least two cards this turn, draw 1 card.
Otherwise, destroy this card.
Quote: "I pray to myself and no one else! Look in the mirror, Kronii! God, you're so beautiful!"

Title: Unwind Time
GameText:
1 ally Hero may salvage 1 card.
Kronii either regains 2 HP or deals 1 target 2 melee damage.
Kronii may deal herself 2 fixed psychic damage. If she is dealt damage this way, play 1 card. Otherwise, salvage 1 card.
Quote: "You have multiple lives to spare, right?"
